mapper.select: select l.order_no as order_no , l.pdt_no as pdt_no , l.pdt_count as pdt_count , f.mem_no as mem_no , f.order_receiver as order_receiver , f.post_code as post_code , f.road_address as road_address , f.detail_address as detail_address , f.receiver_phone as receiver_phone , f.ship_message as ship_message , f.total_price as total_price , f.pay_method as pay_method from order_list l, order_form f where l.order_no = f.order_no and f.mem_no = #{memNo}
